bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: a) identical with yan zi 黶子 . Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry lu ci shi 鸕鶿屎：去面黑䵟 黶志 , “It removes facial gloom, and black moles , and [other] moles.
b) Identical with dao yan 倒黶， inverse black mole. XEWSZWLF 8: 人齒散，治瘡疹黑 黶，發搐危困 , “Powder prepared from human teeth cures sores, papules, black moles , and severe convulsions.

② Pathological Mechanism of crust formation on sores, smallpox, or papules. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry bai mao 白 茅：痘瘡潰爛，難黶不乾 , “For smallpox sores that fester and do not dry, making crust formation difficult”. ③ Pathological Product of crusts on sores. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry shui yin fen 水銀粉 quotes Ji shan tang jing yan fang 積善堂經驗方 : 下疳陰 瘡：輕粉末乾摻之，即結黶而愈 , “For gan -lesions and yin sores in the lower body parts: apply dry qing fen powder to them. This will bring the cure by causing the formation of a crust . ④ Black spots on any item. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ku gua 苦瓠：凡用苦瓠，須細理瑩淨 無黶翳者乃佳 , “Whenever one uses ku gua , only those that have a fine texture, a jade-green color, that are clean, and have no black spots or a shade are good”.
